replies.bodyText: @TomasHofman  Can you please only add the  mockito-core dependency in this PR and format this pom file in another PR ?

timeline.bodyText:
If I understand this correctly, here we already checked Ear deployment. Do we really need this recursion after this check ?
I don't know if this case has already been checked:  there is another sub-deployment has cxf dependencies, and ear-subdeployments-isolated set to false . Do we need to look at this ?
timeline.author: jimma

replies.bodyText:
Agree, based on jboss deployment structure XSD, recursion is not necessary.
I added another check that should take subdeployments-isolated into account.
replies.author: TomasHofman
